data.eml:eml: Systematics and biology of the new genus Macrosaccus with descriptions of two new species (Lepidoptera, Gracillariidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Davis, Donald R., De Prins, Jurate (2011): Systematics and biology of the new genus Macrosaccus with descriptions of two new species (Lepidoptera, Gracillariidae). ZooKeys 98: 29-82, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.98.925, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.98.925
